title: Bedtime stories
creator_credit: International Video Books and Gerben Cath
brief_description: Introduces Dorothy Butler who passionately believes books should play a crucial role in children’s lives. Attempts to encourage children to read, by capitalising on their fascination with the television screen. Uses professional storytellers and well-known stories, giving fully annotated details for each book used.
